name: libpng
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.6.26" %}

package:
  name: libpng
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: libpng-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: ftp://ftp.simplesystems.org/pub/libpng/png/src/libpng16/libpng-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 81bfc8f16ed125622c0c5ad44eeffda19e7a7c7e32f47e43c8932bf32deae7cc

build:
  number: 0
  features:
    - vc9  # [win and py27]
    - vc10  # [win and py34]
    - vc14  # [win and py35]

requirements:
  build:
    - python  # [win]
    - cmake  # [win]
    - libtool  # [not win]
    - automake  # [not win]
    - zlib 1.2.*
    - vc 9  # [win and py27]
    - vc 10  # [win and py34]
    - vc 14  # [win and py35]
  run:
    - zlib 1.2.*
    - vc 9  # [win and py27]
    - vc 10  # [win and py34]
    - vc 14  # [win and py35]

test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libpng.a  # [not win]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libpng.so  # [linux]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libpng.dylib  # [osx]
    - libpng-config --version  # [not win]
    #- conda inspect linkages -p $PREFIX libpng  # [not win]
    #- conda inspect objects -p $PREFIX libpng  # [osx]

about:
  home: http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html
  license: zlib/libpng
  summary: 'PNG reference library.'
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
